statements: SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE policy_type = 'Conventional';
SELECT guideline_id, policy_type, max_loan_amount FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE min_credit_score >= 700;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE debt_to_income_ratio <= 0.3 ORDER BY min_credit_score DESC;
SELECT policy_type, max_loan_amount FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE min_credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 ORDER BY max_loan_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(debt_to_income_ratio) AS average_dti FROM underwriting_guidelines;
SELECT guideline_id, policy_type, max_loan_amount, min_credit_score, debt_to_income_ratio FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE policy_type = 'Mortgage' ORDER BY max_loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE debt_to_income_ratio > 25 AND min_credit_score > 700;
SELECT guideline_id, policy_type, debt_to_income_ratio FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE min_credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 750 ORDER BY debt_to_income_ratio DESC;
SELECT policy_type, AVG(max_loan_amount) AS avg_max_loan_amount FROM underwriting_guidelines GROUP BY policy_type;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_type, COUNT(*) AS count_of_records FROM underwriting_guidelines GROUP BY policy_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY count_of_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE age_limit > 30;
SELECT id, policy_type, income_limit FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE income_limit < 50000;
SELECT * FROM policy_pricing WHERE risk_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT id, policy_type, base_price, risk_factor FROM policy_pricing WHERE base_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT policy_type, AVG(risk_factor) AS avg_risk_factor FROM policy_pricing GROUP BY policy_type;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE age_limit > 50 AND income_limit < 50000
SELECT policy_type, base_price FROM policy_pricing WHERE risk_factor >= 0.5 ORDER BY base_price DESC
SELECT policy_type, age_limit, income_limit FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE policy_type = 'Health' AND age_limit > 18 ORDER BY age_limit, income_limit
SELECT policy_type, base_price * risk_factor AS adjusted_price FROM policy_pricing WHERE policy_type = 'Life' OR policy_type = 'Health' ORDER BY adjusted_price DESC
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records, AVG(income_limit) AS avg_income_limit FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE age_limit <= 40
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingGuidelines;
SELECT guideline_name, min_income FROM UnderwritingGuidelines WHERE max_age < 30;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_guidelines FROM UnderwritingGuidelines;
SELECT policy_id, base_price, discount_rate FROM PolicyPricing WHERE discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT guideline_name, description, MIN(min_age) AS min_age FROM UnderwritingGuidelines GROUP BY guideline_name;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_name, description FROM UnderwritingGuidelines WHERE min_income > 50000 ORDER BY guideline_id DESC;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_name, min_age, max_age FROM UnderwritingGuidelines WHERE max_income < 80000 ORDER BY guideline_id ASC;
SELECT guideline_name, description, min_income, max_income FROM UnderwritingGuidelines WHERE min_age >= 25 AND max_age <= 50 ORDER BY guideline_name ASC;

SELECT assessment_id, risk_score, risk_category FROM RiskAssessment JOIN UnderwritingGuidelines ON RiskAssessment.guideline_id = UnderwritingGuidelines.guideline_id WHERE RiskAssessment.risk_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_id DESC;

SELECT policy_id, base_price, discount_rate FROM PolicyPricing JOIN UnderwritingGuidelines ON PolicyPricing.guideline_id = UnderwritingGuidelines.guideline_id WHERE PolicyPricing.base_price < 10000 ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines;
SELECT product_name, age_range FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, product_name, income_range FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE credit_score_range @> '{"min": 700}';
SELECT product_name, credit_score_range FROM underwriting_guidelines ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, age_range FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE income_range @> '{"min": 50000}';
SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE product_name = 'Insurance' AND age_range @> '{"min": 18, "max": 30}' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, age_range->>'min' AS min_age, age_range->>'max' AS max_age FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE income_range @> '{"min": 50000}' ORDER BY product_name
SELECT id, product_name, credit_score_range FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE credit_score_range @> '{"min": 700}' AND credit_score_range @> '{"max": 800}'
SELECT * FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE credit_score_range @> '{"min": 600}' AND credit_score_range @> '{"max": 750}' ORDER BY product_name ASC

SELECT product_name, age_range, income_range, credit_score_range FROM underwriting_guidelines WHERE income_range @> '{"min": 30000}' AND income_range @> '{"max": 70000}' ORDER BY credit_score_range DESC
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingGuidelines WHERE min_age < 30
SELECT guideline_description, max_income FROM UnderwritingGuidelines WHERE max_age > 50
SELECT customer_name, address FROM CustomerInfo ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT risk_category, risk_score FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score > 80
SELECT policy_id, base_premium FROM PolicyPricing WHERE final_premium < 500
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingGuidelines
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_description, min_age, max_age FROM UnderwritingGuidelines WHERE min_income > 50000

SELECT RiskAssessment.risk_id, guideline_id, risk_category, risk_score FROM RiskAssessment INNER JOIN UnderwritingGuidelines ON RiskAssessment.guideline_id = UnderwritingGuidelines.guideline_id ORDER BY risk_score DESC
SELECT CustomerInfo.customer_id, customer_name, address, email FROM CustomerInfo LEFT JOIN PolicyHistory ON CustomerInfo.customer_id = PolicyHistory.customer_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT PolicyPricing.policy_id, risk_id, base_premium, final_premium FROM PolicyPricing LEFT JOIN RiskAssessment ON PolicyPricing.risk_id = RiskAssessment.risk_id WHERE final_premium BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
